resources.string: Log in with an existing account
This is a demo Shoe Store app. This welcome screen and the following instruction screen will show only once until you log out and log in again. Please read carefully to avoid disappointment!

The shoe listing page will show the list of shoes and show a button for adding a new shoe, while the detail page will be for adding a shoe entry.\n\nAll entries will be saved only as long as the app is running.
